gpt_comment: Meteoblue presents a slightly cooler day with highs of about 24°C (75°F) and lows of 18°C (64°F), compared to the original forecast's 29°C high and 17°C low. Both predict calm, dry conditions. So, pack that light jacket, but leave the umbrella at home.
